item.description:
Note: This meetup is scheduled a little later in the day than the usual time; 3:30 PM

The photo for this meetup is a map of the proposed trail.

Also see the Audubon's site for directions.

http://www.nhaudubon....
item.how_to_find_us: There are signs on Route 28 By Pass that will lead you to the Audubon's Parking lot. Cross the street and follow the signs to the trails. Meeting area will be just on the other side of the main building you see from the parking lot.
item.why: Fun, fUn, fuN, FUn, FUN... need I say more?

group.name: Human Soles & Doggie Paws Hikers & Walkers of Manchester, NH

item.name: Massabessic - Audubon to Battery Point
